programme.title: UCI World Championship Mountain Biking
programme.desc: UCI Mountain Bike World Championship action from the Men's XCO Elite in Valais, Switzerland.

programme.title: UCI WorldTour Cycling
programme.desc: Men's Cycling World Tour action from the 2025 Grand Prix Quebec in Canada. This race features 18 laps of the city circuit, covering 216km and a total elevation gain of 2,610m.

programme.title: UCI WorldTour Cycling
programme.desc: Men's Cycling World Tour action from the 2025 Grand Prix Montreal. This 209km race takes the riders on 17 demanding laps around Mount Royal.

programme.title: Premiership Speedway
programme.desc: Highlights from leg one of the British Speedway ROWE Motor Oil Premiership play-off semi-final between Leicester Lions and Sheffield Tigers at Hydroscand Arena.

programme.title: Live: English Open Snooker
programme.desc: Action from round three and match nine of the 2025 English Open, part of the Snooker Home Nations Series.

programme.title: Live: English Open Snooker
programme.desc: Round three and match ten of the 2025 English Open, part of the Snooker Home Nations Series.

programme.title: SailGP
programme.desc: Highlights from the Saint Tropez SailGP on the French Riviera. Quentin Delapierre's Les Bleus will be seeking glory in front of their home crowd.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Mikel Arteta's Arsenal kick-off their UEFA Champions League campaign with a trip to face Ernesto Valverde's Athletic Bilbao at San Mames Stadium.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Eredivisie winners PSV welcome Sebastien Pocognoli's Belgian champions Union Saint-Gilloise to Philips Stadion.

programme.title: Young And Dangerous : Reloaded
programme.desc: Based on a popular comic featuring the adventures of a young triad gang in Mongkok, this sharp remake features a new generation in a razor-edged thriller.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Lok is recovering from schizophrenia when he meets and falls for the beautiful Yan. Before he could tell her of his illness, he has a relapse. Is their relationship doomed?

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A young man is wrongly convicted of drug trafficking. A former cop turned prosecutor believes in his innocence and launches an investigation, risking his life and career to find the true perpetrator.

programme.title: Cape No. 7
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer tries to deliver seven old love letters attentioned to a Tomoko. As he falls in love with a young Japanese model also named Tomoko, he unravels their serendipitous connection.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: When Fleur join her university's hip hop team, a journey begins which lead her into the heated world of dance competitions and a complicated romance.

programme.title: The Locksmith
programme.desc: Hao Ren inherits the skills of Locksmith Shan and befriends Detective Liu who often seeks his help. When Hao Ren unveils the mystery of Shan's wife's disappearance one day, strange events ensue.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: A middle-aged man grieving the death of his wife attempts to find closure by retracing their journey of love & fulfilling the dream she once had.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenix's parents are secret martial arts heroes ferreting out evildoers. Phoenix gets the chance to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: After a security engineer unwittingly becomes involved in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three tales merges in this satire set against Hong Kong's housing crisis, where soaring property prices have driven people to desperate measures - including sharing a space with the dead!

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: The highest grossing Chinese movie in Hong Kong history, the story tells of a barrister who swears to prove his client's innocence, going against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: When an engaged couple is requested to invite their parents for a CNY client event, the fiance - who is estranged from his mother, fakes a family. However, things spiral out of control.

programme.title: The Grandmaster
programme.desc: Directed by Wong Kar Wai, this epic action film begins in Foshan when Ip Man defending southern fighting styles against a master of the North, Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond.

programme.title: Men Suddenly In Love
programme.desc: When five male ex-classmates reunite to throw their 80-year old biology teacher a birthday party, five hot models take the party to an unexpected level.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth 2
programme.desc: Set as a prequel, when the sun was found to be dying, humans build enormous engines on the Earth's surface to find a new home. To save the world, a group of young people decide to step forth.

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer cares for his intellectually challenged father Wah. When Mancer finds solace in stand-up comedy, he turns his life's hardships into comedic gold, from school ridicule to pandemic woes.

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: The Queen of Female Kingdom falls in love with Monk Tang, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be killed. As the River Spirit appears, the kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming must attend his father's funeral to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he reunites with his ex-girlfriend and her family, but ended up falling into their trap.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Bullet and Brain now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr. Lo's sons prank Kung on his birthday with a fake lottery win, sparking chaos that unexpectedly heals old wounds and brings the quirky family closer together.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Debt-ridden wedding planner, Sheng, finds a lifeline as he transitions into a funeral planner. Inspired by the respected Master Wen, Sheng gradually changes his attitude towards his career and life.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: The 1st Asian New Media FF's Best Actress Chrissie Chau reunites with Ekin Cheng in this story of three jilted men, who decide to invest in android girlfriends.

programme.title: High Forces
programme.desc: An A380 airliner is hijacked by gunmen on its maiden flight. Among the passengers is a security expert, whose daughter is one of the captives. Can he save all the passengers and avert the crisis?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Revisit the legend of Ma Yong Zhen, a boxer who only wanted to survive in Shanghai, but was swept into a battle against its largest triad on a quest for revenge.

programme.title: Ultimate Malevolence
programme.desc: Featuring three stories about two high school friends, a magician and a lost man, the movie reveals the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!
